content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining and Storage Facility at Position (x=52.5, y=-84.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (x=53.0, y=-83.0) connected to a Wooden Chest at position (x=52.5, y=-84.5) for coal extraction and storage.

### Iron Ore Mining and Processing Facility at Position (x=-14.5, y=-54.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (x=-14.0, y=-53.0) connected to a Wooden Chest at position (x=-14.5, y=-54.5) for iron ore extraction.
- Stone Furnace at position (x=-19.0, y=-65.0) for smelting iron ore, connected via a Burner Inserter at position (x=-17.5, y=-64.5) to a Wooden Chest at position (x=-16.5, y=-64.5) for storing iron plates.

### Copper Ore Mining and Transport System at Position (x=-25.5, y=-65.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (x=-25.0, y=-64.0) connected to a BeltGroup starting at position (x=-25.5, y=-65.5) for copper ore extraction and transport.

### Iron Plate Smelting Facility at Position (x=0.0, y=0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (x=0.0, y=0.0) with a warning of no ingredients to smelt.
- Burner Inserter at position (x=2.5, y=0.5) connected to a Wooden Chest at position (x=1.5, y=0.5) for handling iron plates.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Warning: No Ingredients to Smelt in Furnace
- Ensure that the furnace at position (x=0.0, y=0.0) has the necessary ingredients to smelt to avoid idle time and inefficiency.
